attributes.action: Why doesn’t the Government treat its Citizens living anywhere in the EU EQUALLY?
attributes.additional_details:
They wouldn’t include this minority group of citizens last time though the result affects them more than groups they allowed! ALLOW THEM to be included in future democratic voting which affect their lives! End Mar’19 may see pensioners in Europe WITHOUT PENSIONS-UK Gov: Technical Notice 23.08.18 & HEALTHCARE, Connexionfrance.com Aug’18. Working families follow, causing overload of NHS/benefit system/housing/schools & employment; UK infrastructure collapses.
The People didn’t know that in June’16
attributes.background: In certain circumstances Parliament allow Electoral Register amendments for one-off votes to include groups not normally allowed to vote i.e. June 2016; Members of House of Lords & People of Gibraltar as the result affects EVERY aspect of their lives BUT penalised UK citizens living mainland Europe!
